fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Feed on two player's hatred each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If both players are town members, deal a Powerful Attack to two players the next night. If one Is Town and the other Is an evil faction, deal an Unstoppable Attack to two players the next night. If they're both evil, deal an Unstoppable Rampaging attack to three players the next night.
